import './SelectedRecipes.css' import React from "react" import AddRecipes from '../AddRecipes/AddRecipes' const SelectedRecipes = (props) => { const nameRef = React.useRef() const quantityRef = React.useRef() const newIngredient = (event) => { props.addIngredient(event, { name : nameRef.current.value, quantity: quantityRef.current.value }) } return (

Receta Seleccionadas:

{props.recipeDetail.name}

Número de personas: {props.recipeDetail.numPeople}

{props.recipeDetail.ingredients.map((ing) => )}
Ingrediente Cantidad Acciones
{ing.name} {ing.quantity}
) } export default SelectedRecipes
